scripts.assets:swiper: cp node_modules/swiper/swiper-bundle.min.js lib/swiper/swiper-bundle.min.js & cp node_modules/swiper/swiper-bundle.min.css lib/swiper/swiper-bundle.min.css & cp node_modules/swiper/LICENSE lib/swiper/LICENSE
scripts.watch: wp-scripts start src/block.js & npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js & gulp
scripts.build: (wp-scripts build src/block.js && npm run compile:css && npm run compile:js) && npm run i18n && gulp build
scripts.watch:css: node-sass css/ -o css/ --source-map true --output-style expanded --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 -w
scripts.i18n: (wp i18n make-pot . languages/slider.pot --exclude=src,dist,node_modules) && wp i18n make-json languages --no-purge
